long_description: When the sun's not shining, stash you sunglasses in this medium-size SunCloud Active Zip semi-hard case for secure protection. Lightweight case absorbs shock and protects your glasses without the confines of a bulky rigid case. Zippered closure keeps glasses secure, while the soft lining protects delicate lenses.
short_description: When the sun's not shining, stash you sunglasses in this medium-size SunCloud Active Zip semi-hard case for secure protection.
